name: Vectoroids
description:
A Remake of a Classic Asteroids Game!

Shoot your way through waves of Asteroids and UFOs in Classic Mode. Play as a Team with up to 4 Players in Co-Op Mode. Battle your Friends in Deathmatch and Last Man Standing on 5 different Battle Maps.

FEATURES

- Arcade Classic Mode.
- Team Co-Op Mode (Up to 4 Players).
- Battle Mode Deathmatch (Up to 4 Players).
- Battle Mode Last Man Standing (Up to 4 Players).
- 5 Battle Maps.
- Robotic Voice Effects.
- Arcade Highscores.
- Gamepad Support.
